NSE Live Market data

Source: R/nselive.R
nselive.Rd

NSE Live Market data

nselive(x = "n50")

Source

<https://www1.nseindia.com/live_market/dynaContent/live_watch/equities_stock_watch.htm?cat=N>

Arguments

x

"n50" and "fo" for nifty 50 and F&O. DEFAULT value is "n50".

Value

A dataframe with NSE Live market data.

Details

Get live NSE market data of Nifty 50 and Futures & Options

Note

NSE pre-open market 09.00 hrs to 9.08 hrs (IST). Regular Trading Session 09.15 hrs to 15.30 hrs (IST)

See also

bhavprbhavfobhavtodaynseindexnseopen

Author

Nandan L. Patil tryanother609@gmail.com

Examples

# \donttest{
# NSE Live market data for Nifty 50 stocks
library(nser)
nselive()
#> Error: requests.exceptions.ConnectionError: HTTPSConnectionPool(host='www.nseindia.com', port=443): Max retries exceeded with url: /api/equity-stockIndices?index=SECURITIES%20IN%20F%26O (Caused by NameResolutionError("<urllib3.connection.HTTPSConnection object at 0x000001F41603C110>: Failed to resolve 'www.nseindia.com' ([Errno 11001] getaddrinfo failed)"))

# Live market for F&O stocks
nselive("fo")
#> Error: requests.exceptions.ConnectionError: HTTPSConnectionPool(host='www.nseindia.com', port=443): Max retries exceeded with url: /api/equity-stockIndices?index=SECURITIES%20IN%20F%26O (Caused by NameResolutionError("<urllib3.connection.HTTPSConnection object at 0x000001F41603E590>: Failed to resolve 'www.nseindia.com' ([Errno 11001] getaddrinfo failed)"))
# }
